attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To bring price parity between diesel and petrol. People bought diesel cars because of the efficiency. Diesel is cheaper then petrol in Europe why is it more expensive then petrol in the UK?

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
